showingQuoteData.author: Your developers.
showingQuoteData.text: Use PLUS to get a quote...

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I´m not sure about the universe.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: While we are postponing, life speeds by.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Tomorrow, life is too late. Live today.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Never, never, never, never give up.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: And the trouble is, if you don´t risk anything, you risk even more.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.
